dict.acceptation: 失败，不及格；倒闭，破产；缺乏；衰退；
衰退；失败，不及格；破产；不足；
不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃；
失败，失误；不及格；不及格者；[商]期货交割失期；

sent.orig: This provides fail-fast behavior, rather than non-deterministic behavior in the face of concurrent modification iteration.
sent.trans: 一旦在遍历过程中遇到同步修改时，会导致fail-fast特性而不是非确定的行为。

sent.orig: The state of the stream is revealed by the bad, fail, eof, and good operations.
sent.trans: 流的状态由bad、fail、eof和good操作提示。

sent.orig: Rule of Repair: When you must fail, fail noisily and as soon as possible.
sent.trans: 补救原则：出现异常时，马上退出并给出足够的错误信息。

sent.orig: If you fail to plan, you plan to fail.
sent.trans: 如果你不能做计划，那你就在计划失败。

sent.orig: Try again, Fail again, Fail better.
sent.trans: 再试，再失败，更好的失败。
